shieldWizardApplyShield_shieldCreated_su: Apply this Shield to an Account or a Persona. You can update it any time.
shieldWizardApplyShield_shieldCreated_no: To apply your Shield on the Radix Network, you’ll need to sign a transaction
Not enough XRD to pay transaction. Get some XRD tokens first to apply Shields.
shieldWizardApplyShield_shieldCreated_ap: Apply to an Account or a Persona
shieldWizardApplyShield_chooseAccounts_s: Choose the Account you want to apply this Shield to.
shieldWizardApplyShield_choosePersonas_s: Choose the Persona you want to apply this Shield to.
shieldWizardApplyShield_applyShield_subt: Now let’s apply your Shield on the Radix Network with a transaction. To prepare the transaction you’ll need to present the factors used to build your Shield
